proposal: Understanding the essence of Mai Finance's mission to unlock value from priced assets through a non-custodial and open-source stable protocol, we see a world of possibilities. With 217 holders in the ETH network, congratulations on building a solid foundation! Imagine integrating our DEX or Lottery tools to further empower your community, allowing them to deploy and share in the revenue. Together, we can create more avenues for value extraction and community engagement. Let's explore this synergy.
